title: Chilli and ginger steak stir fry
ingredients: ['2 portions thin dried egg noodles', '250g sirloin or rump steak, cut into thin strips', '1 clove garlic, finely sliced', '1 (2cm) piece root ginger, finely sliced', '4 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '1 tablespoon honey', '6 mushrooms, quartered', '1 carrot, julienned', '1/2 red pepper, julienned', '1/2 large red chilli, deseeded and finely sliced', '1 small red onion, roughly quartered', '2 tablespoons sesame oil']
